website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering for anyone who likes classic penny loafers and Sperrys, as these sport the looks and quality typical of the popular brand.
pros: A timeless style by a top name in shoes
Traditional penny loafers by Sperry with excellent traction and memory foam footbeds
cons: Sizes run narrow, but ordering about 1/2 size larger than usual works for most customers

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: This shoes exceeded my expectations. They're very sharp and professional looking, they go with every outfit. I'm a size 6.5 and the 6.5 I ordered is a perfect fit. These loafers didn't require any breaking in; they felt perfect the first time I tried them on. They offer more support and cushion than most loafers, and I keep describing them as "walking on pillows". I plan to wear this pair to death, and then purchase another. I highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Fed Ghali

customer_reviews.title: I love Sperry loafers
customer_reviews.text: I love Sperry loafers. The Seaport were a bit narrow and small. Luckily I read early reviews and ordered the 8 and not the 7 1/2 that most of my Sperrys are.
customer_reviews.author: tpenn

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these. I am a real eastland penny loafer lover and have several pairs. I thought I would try sperry brand to compare and I love them. I am a true 9 with a normal to wide foot and they feel great. They dont feel narrow to me. I will probanly out some arch inserts in when I wear them to work for a long day but other than that they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Darcie

customer_reviews.title: Classy and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I really wanted a casual and classy basic. I bought these based on my favorite fashion bloggers advice and she was 100% correct! They are wonderful. The leather is of high quality. The fit is true to size. I normally wear a 10 and I bought tens and they fit well. They are leather so I expect them to get a little looser over time as I will probably wear them every day. I am a teacher and walk all day. I wear these to work and look classy and feel great! I highly recommend these loafers! The brown leather color is soft are beautiful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie J

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got these to wear at an office with pants, and I'm in love. The insoles are so comfortable and have already started to mold to my foot shape after two days. The toe box was a little tight at first, but I decided to keep my usual size, and good thing, because they do start to relax with some wear. They look and feel wonderful at a great price point. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Narrow and they do not seem of good quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m returning these. I ordered a 7.5, my usual Sperry size, but I can’t even get my foot in them. They are very narrow, even to me, and I have a narrow to regular medium width foot. I also thought they just looked like cheap shoes, there’s something about the cut and shape that is off. They may fit someone else perfectly, they just aren’t for me. And I was really wanting to love these.
customer_reviews.author: LWeaver

customer_reviews.title: Poor QC
customer_reviews.text: The tan loafer was not a size 8. More like a size 6. I ordered this shoe in black as well. It fit true to size (8). It is very comfortable to wear. No break-in period required. Very well made shoe. I still like my Bass Wejuns which I have bought for years. Wish tan loafer would not have been defective in size.
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: Classic design and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have an old pair of Sherry’s in this style that has lasted years so I decided to buy a newer pair. I ordered the tan 6.5 as I usually wear 6.5 in flats and 7 in shoes. The fit is a little snug but over time they tend to stretch so I’m sure the fit is just right. Great to dress up or down for work. Would recommend this and will likely buy another pair in a different color soon.
customer_reviews.author: ksapp

customer_reviews.title: Penny loafer
customer_reviews.text: Nice tan shoe. A little tight, but will be stretched soon. The tongue almost was a deal breaker, because it is about 1 inch higher up than the old penny loafers., which make feet appear longer than normal. The sole is foam and unbreathable for warm weather, but plan to keep shoes, and wear with thin socks this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Smithbc1

customer_reviews.title: Love Sperrys!
customer_reviews.text: I have a ton of sperrys but I wanted some penny loafers. These are very nice shoes. High quality, very comfy and priced right. They run a little small for me so I went a size up. They are not tan they are a different darker shade brown almost reddish brown. They are very nice overall!
customer_reviews.author: MeticulousOne

customer_reviews.title: Spend an extra $5 and go to Macy’s!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes I received were more red than tan. Very disappointing!! Not at all like the color in the pictures nor the same “tan” shoes with the same Sperry description seen in major department stores. Didn’t even come in a Sperry box. Sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: These Sperry's are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I had tried on this shoe at a TJ Maxx in a larger size than I normally wear (they had them for like $49) so I knew that I liked them at that point. I was super excited to find them on Amazon in a wide width option, because literally no one else had them in WW. When they arrived they still looked a bit narrow, but they fit perfect right out of the box! The leather is nice and soft and the insoles have a nice cushion to them. I've received many compliments on the shoe and will definitely buy another pair in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Information  not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews still unsure about size so I ordered my usual size an 8. They were too tight so I'm returning them and trying an 8.5 hope they will work. Love the look and feel of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a pair of Penny Loafers for a long time. Haven't worn them since High School but have had my eye on them for a while. Great quality and fit. One of my favorite purchases.
customer_reviews.author: LorenaLReneFrancis

customer_reviews.title: Buy wide!
customer_reviews.text: I've never bought a 7 WIDE in my life but sure could have for this one. Once broken in it'll be fine, but it's an effort to get them over my heel. I have slim feet, just saying!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could these possibly be 2nd’s???
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter to wear when she started her new job. 3 weeks after wearing, the heels are coming apart. She loves the style, fit & comfort of the shoe but expected better quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: So cute, yet professional and super grippy. A solid shoe that kept up with all my meetings, errands, and looked great. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Cute, professional, comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: They look professional and stylish, and comfortable enough for my 20 minute walk to work! Heel and toe box fit great and as indicated, it has some cushion, but arch support isn’t there. A partial orthotic could help this. Would buy another pair in another color. They look more expensive than the price!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shoe but runs narrow: Wide is more like a B width
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shoe, extremely narrow. I ordered a 1/2 size up and a W width and couldn't get the shoes on with socks. Returning. I will not order a different size because the 8 is already a bit too long.
customer_reviews.author: SFMS

customer_reviews.title: Too tight.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely made super narrow. I Have always worn a normal width but these are narrow and tight. Length was fine but width is off! Normally wear an 8.5 or 9. Got these in an 8.5 which was perfect in length but width not good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, but the threading is unraveling already. I only wear them once or twice a week, this should not be happening.
customer_reviews.author: Monica M.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for work
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect shoe. Very comfortable and goes with just about anything business casual. Has the Sperry high quality that I expect. I've had these shoes for about 1 1/2 years. They are holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Kand2010

customer_reviews.title: Fine leather loafer
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe! Very well made and the leather is high quality. I have been looking for a loafer and this one is exactly what I was looking for. I wear a size 8-8 1/2 so I ordered an 8 1/2. Fits fine but probably will wear without socks or at least thin ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Women's Sperry Seaport Topsider penny loafer: excellent shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I love this Sperry loafer. This is my 3rd pair.. They are so comfortable right out of the box. No break-in time needed. They look classic. Quality is great. I would definitely recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: camperdog

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I measure just over a 7.5D on the brannock. I ordered an 8, and they fit perfectly with a think ped sock. I am a librarian--they are perfect for work, super comfortable, and super cute. I ordered the brown leather. They will get that worn, weathered look, so you will need a leather conditioner if you want to keep the "like new" look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have a long narrow foot and these fit me perfectly. I purchased my normal 9.5 size. They fit like a glove and are super soft and comfy. If You have a tendency for foot swelling when walking for a long time, you may want to order a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Tanja ~KT Book Reviews~

customer_reviews.title: Run Very Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I received these shoes as a gift in my normal shoe size and they were way too small! I had to really force my foot into the shoe, so I reordered in a half size up and in a wide width, but now they’re a tad big. I should have ordered just wider. The shoes run very narrow, I’ve never needed a wide size before.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are extremely narrow. Order the wide.
customer_reviews.text: If you've never ordered wide sizes before, order the wide version of this shoe. Regular fits very narrow, couldn't get my foot in it, wide fit perfect...I've never worn a wide in any other shoe..
customer_reviews.author: justin barnes

customer_reviews.title: Sperry Loafer - - -
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shoe. I first saw it at a local discount store, but they did not have my size. I checked all over the area, but could not find it. I decided to pay twice as much for this shoe, since I desperately wanted it! I do not regret paying the price for this wonderfully comfortable, adorable shoe:)
customer_reviews.author: Kizzy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and snug
customer_reviews.text: If you have a narrow foot, these are the shoes for you! I love these Becca's they feel great, give me good support, look good and stay on my foot. I have a small narrow foot with a high arch and I find these amazing.
customer_reviews.author: msjessi

customer_reviews.title: Great Loafers at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! This is my third pair and I am really hard on them. I wear them everyday rain or shine. They last, they are comfortable with a classic look. This is the best price that I’ve paid thus far. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bear and Suki

customer_reviews.title: Great loafer!
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because of the confusing sizing. For reference I have slightly narrow feet and I ordered my usual 6.5. When I first took these out of the box and tried them on I was so disappointed. At first they fit super narrow - I could barely get my feet into them and yet my toe wasn't even hitting the front of them so if I sized up they would be way too big. I was leaning towards returning them, but I wore them around the house and they stretched out perfectly. Now they are so comfortable! They're a great classic loafer!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Penny Loafer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried 3 different well-known brand loafers this season; none fit and looked as great as these! I’m a penny loafer lover and these are perfect! Great fit! Great Look!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: So happy with these
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and cute, I bought them in two colors. They have arch support inside and a very comfortable foot bed. They were also very easy to break in... Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D. Werner

customer_reviews.title: Timeless classic
customer_reviews.text: These are my new go to. Finally I found a classic penny loafer in wide width. They are very much like my loafers from decades ago but improve with a non slip bottom. Beautiful stitching. They took no time to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Boutilier

customer_reviews.title: Slick shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I get compliments on them almost every time I wear them. My only complaint is the soles around the edges are starting to peel a bit, and the shoes are only a couple of months old.
customer_reviews.author: pilky01

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with insoles
customer_reviews.text: My feet have arch problems so I use these shoes with a gel cushion inside. Also they are little bit heavy. Overall however they are great,I get compliments about my brown ones and I like how thick the leather is,meaning these shoes will be very durable
customer_reviews.author: Malika Kassymova

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair. Well made. Great fit. At first you may think they are hard to put on... but once your foot is in...so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Moranna

customer_reviews.title: Shoe too small.
customer_reviews.text: I would be interested in knowing if this shoe runs true to size. I’m very disappointed that I have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Bogeysmama

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!! Worth the money 💰!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever bought. I took them to the Amalfi coast and if you’ve ever been it’s known for it’s stairs and hills. I would definitely recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Steele

customer_reviews.title: Larger toe area rather than classic penny loafer.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a little too “my three sons” looking. Otherwise decent loafer. I was looking for more a classic penny loafer.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with decent support
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter who works on her feet most of the day. She loves them and says they are very comfortable with decent support.
customer_reviews.author: cate

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Perfect comfort. Dressy and casual. Love these shoes. Size is exact true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Terry

customer_reviews.title: Nice loafer
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these in another color and liked them so much I ordered this pair. They are very comfortable and the leather just softens with time so it’s like wearing a house shoe. I’ve gotten lots of compliments on them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya MG

customer_reviews.title: These loafers are very comfortables.
customer_reviews.text: I love to wear loafers and they look beautiful dress with jeans or skirts. Sperry womens seaport are the best
customer_reviews.author: Sja

customer_reviews.title: Trying to get all colors!
customer_reviews.text: I love these loafers! They look and fit great. Super comfortable. I've used them for office, casual settings. And I've also walked quite a bit wearing these. Currently have the black and brown. I've got my eye on the 3rd one :)
customer_reviews.author: Brenda R

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great! I’m glad they brought this style back since ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great! I’m glad they brought this style back since it’s very versatile and comfortable! I’m sorry it wasn’t brought back sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Mitsuki

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice comfortable shoe. It is a tad more narrow than I like, but it doesn't hurt. I love them with one exception: the thread on the upper portion is starting to unravel. I've only had them a few weeks and only wear them to work. Not sure if they can be replaced. Carol C.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality shoes , bought them bigger than my size to give some room , they are slim fit and I have wide ones but I stretch them and they fit well now.
customer_reviews.author: Purposeful

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Have them in two colors.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Stylish and comfortable. I wear them to work all day.
customer_reviews.author: R Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Sperry loafers
customer_reviews.text: I love my new shoes. I wore them today. Very nice fit. Great choice. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tuck09

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very appealing and go well with business casual or jeans. At least... I suppose they do. I couldn't get my foot even halfway into the shoe. I've worn a 9 for as long as I can remember but this 9 was narrow and way too small.
customer_reviews.author: ESB90

customer_reviews.title: May need to order half size smaller
customer_reviews.text: I love how comfortable these shoes are! They are every bit as comfy as the deck shoes, but they are dressy enough that I can where them to work. The sole is rubber, so there is no worry about slipping. I wear size 8 1/2 in sneakers, but had to order size 8 in these Sperrys. The size 8 1/2 were too large and slipped off my heal. The size 8 are slightly snug in the toe at first, but then loosened up enough to be very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarrah Jane Pease

customer_reviews.title: Size not as represented
customer_reviews.text: The size was no where near what I expected for a shoe sold as a wide width. The length seemed right but as I couldn't get them on, I really don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow? NO! Just right! (If you have B width feet)
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! Based on the reviews, I thought these would be too narrow, even for my normal(ish) feet. They were a bit snug at first but because they’re leather, I knew they would obviously stretch. They did, and after a short breaking-in period. They fit perfectly. These are easily my favorite pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah James Miles

customer_reviews.title: Slightly more narrow than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely attractive shoe it definitely meets all my visual expectations!! However, I wish I had purchased a half size larger. Toe box & width slightly more narrow than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Fayling

customer_reviews.title: Favorite loafers
customer_reviews.text: New favorite shoe! Going to order another in different color.
customer_reviews.author: 32wags

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, and what a beautiful color. Love the real leather!
customer_reviews.author: Abril Macias

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: A bit tight initially, and stretched out to a comfortable fit. I don’t wear socks or footies with mine. No stink. Leather holds up super well. Very comfy and versatile.
customer_reviews.author: krobb

customer_reviews.title: Best business casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable. Not more hours of walking. But most comfortable business casual shoes ever. Can be dressed up or down. Can’t wait to wear for years and repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Not the original box
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. A little on the narrow side but I hope they stretch a bit. I didn't like that the shoes did not come in the original box.
customer_reviews.author: Daphny

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't remember the last time I put on a pair of shoes (not including sneakers) that needed NO breaking in! Felt terrific from the moment I put them on. I wanted to get Bass penny loafers but could never tolerate the time it would take to break them in. These are great and worth every dime, so I bought a second pair in black. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tarheel

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out of the box. Quality leather. I have the grey nubuck style, and the tan is my second pair. ♥
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes, phenomenal quality. Will probably like other colors too. Fit is normal.
customer_reviews.author: Alfiegirl63

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a classic asset to the professional and sophisticated wardrobe. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: KellyS

customer_reviews.title: True to size and good looking!
customer_reviews.text: Love this loafer. Quality and look of this loader are perfect. Would definently buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Drane

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, go to shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Sperry loafers and I am once again thrilled with my purchase! They are high quality, supportive, and are a great choice for long days in the office. They clean well and last long! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Kathryn Polka

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Product and Service
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were exactly as described and shipped immediately. I am beyond impressed with the quality, customer service, and over all satisfaction with the entire purchasing process.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Great , stylish shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome shoe. It is so comfortable and true to size. I teach school so, I am on my feet all day. These shoes did not hurt one bit.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: It was the second pair I order this year. Very comfortable and stylish! I will probably buy a third pair in another color this fall.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I had to order a half size up as others suggested. So comfortable. They go great with jeans or pants.
customer_reviews.author: Hoopey-Cat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I want every color! Absolute comfort and I work on my feet in a restaurant
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy professional shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Sperry brand to begin with but these penny loafers are COMFY! I have average feet, however. Normal arches, not too narrow or wide, but very long feet for my height. These shoes are super comfy and professional.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Raun

customer_reviews.title: Sooo comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I own two pairs of Sperry loaders and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: MVJM

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great - I love the fit, and the look. I got the wide width
customer_reviews.author: Felice

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfectly & look great with jeans, khakis, or capris. Comfortable with or without socks/peds.
customer_reviews.author: S. St

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and classic
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I have ever purchased a shoe that was a perfect fit right out of the box until these loafers. They haven’t pinched or rubbed at all. I have received many compliments and they compliment so many outfits and styles. Absolutely love these loafers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: It was really nice and well made but not wide enough
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit in a wide 👌
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful classic loafers. I have bunions on both feet and usually only wear new balance shoes. These fit me with out any pain and are perfect for the days I have meetings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe-works with skirts, plants or jeans. Heel is perfect height. Leather softens up and shapes yo your foot quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very hesitant to order without trying them on but very pleased with the fit. So comfortable. Great color.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Gagne

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Very comfortable. I normally wear 8.5 wide but I was it was too snug so went with the 9 wide. They have stretched some. 8.5 might have been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Platts

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes last week and was so excited for them to come in the mail! So far, they're been super comfortable to break in and I do a lot of walking during the day too! Quickly becoming my favorite pair of loafers!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Zohner

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe! It is comfortable from day 1 and look really stylish! After a week from purchasing it I walked 35,000 steps in a trip and ended with no blisters. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Jimena Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color and just as expected. They are a narrow fit which is perfect for me and they were a little snug, but quickly formed to my foot after one wear. A timeless classic style...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable flats
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Got first pair in Singapore and struggled to find another pair which could be shipped to the U.K. Really want a black and navy pair but yet to find a supplier which will ship :-(
customer_reviews.author: R. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Need broke in.
customer_reviews.text: Box was destroyed. But no damage to the shoes. Like most Sperry’s runs small until worn in.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Amsden

customer_reviews.title: Great loafer!
customer_reviews.text: These are a favorite shoe! They have support and are broken in easily. I’m on my third pair!
customer_reviews.author: louise a.

customer_reviews.title: Just go wide!
customer_reviews.text: Normally, a medium width would be fine but I had to go with a wide on this shoe and I couldn’t be happier with the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Rivera

customer_reviews.title: I just love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I just love this shoe. The leather is supple, the color is exactly as it appeared online and it fits really well. Love them and expect to wear them all fall!
customer_reviews.author: Eric C Elstran

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Will order another pair.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shoe because it was slightly narrower and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Ordering correct size is difficult
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were too big. Information states true to size but still too large. Was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Sperry Seaport
customer_reviews.text: Classy and Comfortable. I wear a 4 1/2 and the 5 fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value for the brand and the shoes are beautiful, love them.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly landrum

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wore my loafers for the first time today, and they were so comfortable starting the minute I put them on!
customer_reviews.author: Cookie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This loafer is great for work and being on your feet. I did not need any time to break this shoe in.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: fit was just right
customer_reviews.text: was able to exchange for another size, first pair was too small
customer_reviews.author: Brian Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect work shoes! I love the color and they are super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THEM!!!! They were EXACTLY what I wanted! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: These Shoes.....
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the most comfortable pair of shoes I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
